creditline: The Marilyn C. Benson Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: side chair with gently sloping back; oval purple velvet cushion at center of back; carved wooden ribbon detail on back with carved stylized Fleur-de-lies design at upper C; slightly curved carved, spindly legs; purple velvet seat that pops out
markings: carved mark under seat cushion at front of chair: [VIII]
medium: Walnut and beech with modern velvet upholstery
title: Side chair
